r.s: Provides a wrapper to the ImageMagick library.
r.d:
Imagick is a native php extension to create and modify images using the ImageMagick API. This extension requires ImageMagick version 6.2.4+ and PHP 5.1.3+.
IMPORTANT: Version 2.x API is not compatible with earlier versions.
r.n: - Fixes incorrect error message "wand contains no images" - Change cropthumbnailimage behavior to actually do what it is supposed to do - setimageartifact, getimageartifact, deleteimageartifact - added fill param to thumbnailImage - Added support for using imagick objects in other extensions
